main event: Observers watched a cylinder-shaped object with a rotating green light on the middle part for several nights. The object appeared white on the top and red on the bottom and disappeared instantaneously to the north.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 3 to 5 minutes, moving in a circular, gyrating motion at a steady speed with no sound emitted.
The object executed a zigzag pattern before fading out while moving northward.
The sighting occurred over multiple nights, indicating repeated observations of the same or similar phenomenon.
The observers were described as experienced in observing aerial phenomena.
Despite the detailed description, no physical evidence such as photographs was obtained.
sighted object: cylinder-shaped object with a rotating green light
